entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
